00001 module eqdsk
00002     implicit none
00003     save    
00004     character (len=10) :: case_ ( 6 )
00005     integer :: idum, nw, nh, nbbbs, limitr
00006     real :: rdim, zdim, rcentr, rleft, zmid, 
00007         rmaxis, zmaxis, simag, sibry, bcentr,  
00008         current, xdum, rStep, zStep, fStep
00009     
00010     real, allocatable :: fpol (:), psizr (:,:), 
00011         pres (:), ffprim (:), pprime (:), qpsi (:), 
00012         rbbbs (:), zbbbs (:), rlim (:), zlim (:), 
00013         r (:), z (:), bR(:,:), bPhi(:,:), bz(:,:), 
00014         fluxGrid (:), fpolRZ(:,:), bMag(:,:)
00015 
00016 contains
00017     subroutine read_geqdsk ( eqdsk_fileName, plot )
00018         !use dislin
00019         use dlg
00020  
00021         implicit none
00022         
00023         integer :: i, j, iErr
00024         character(len=*), intent(IN) :: eqdsk_fileName
00025         logical, intent(IN), optional :: plot
00026         real, allocatable :: yp(:), xp(:), temp(:), ss(:), yp_c(:)
00027         real :: spl1 = 0.0, spln = 0.0, t, curv2, sigma = 0.0
00028 
00029         !!   Plotting variables
00030     
00031         !integer :: nLevs
00032         !real :: levStep, lev
00033 
00034         !   Read in variables from geqdsk file
00035 
00036         open ( unit = 8, file = eqdsk_fileName, status = 'OLD' )
00037 
00038         read ( 8, 2000 ) ( case_ (i), i=1, 6 ), idum, nw, nh 
00039         read ( 8, 2020 ) rdim,zdim,rcentr,rleft,zmid 
00040         read ( 8, 2020 ) rmaxis,zmaxis,simag,sibry,bcentr 
00041         read ( 8, 2020 ) current,simag,xdum,rmaxis,xdum 
00042         read ( 8, 2020 ) zmaxis,xdum,sibry,xdum,xdum 
00043         
00044         allocate ( fpol ( nw ), pres ( nw ), ffprim ( nw ), &
00045             pprime ( nw ), psizr ( nw, nh ), qpsi ( nw ), &
00046             r ( nw ), z ( nh ), fluxGrid ( nw ) )
00047         
00048         read ( 8, 2020 ) ( fpol (i), i=1, nw ) 
00049         read ( 8, 2020 ) ( pres (i), i=1, nw ) 
00050         read ( 8, 2020 ) ( ffprim (i), i=1, nw ) 
00051         read ( 8, 2020 ) ( pprime (i), i=1, nw ) 
00052         read ( 8, 2020 ) ( ( psizr (i,j), i=1, nw ), j=1, nh ) 
00053         read ( 8, 2020 ) ( qpsi (i), i=1, nw ) 
00054         
00055         read ( 8, 2022 ) nbbbs,limitr 
00056         
00057         allocate ( rbbbs ( nbbbs ), zbbbs ( nbbbs ), &
00058             rlim ( limitr ), zlim ( limitr ) )
00059         
00060         read ( 8, 2020 ) ( rbbbs (i), zbbbs (i), i=1,nbbbs ) 
00061         read ( 8, 2020 ) ( rlim (i), zlim (i), i=1,limitr ) 
00062          
00063         2000 format (6a8,3i4) 
00064         2020 format (5e16.9)
00065         2022 format (2i5) 
00066         
00067         close ( unit = 8 )
00068         
00069         !   Calculate other required variables
00070        
00071         rStep   = rdim / ( nw - 1 )
00072         zStep   = zdim / ( nh - 1 )
00073         fStep   = ( sibry - simag ) / ( nw - 1 )
00074 
00075         r   = (/ (i,i=0,nw-1) /) * rStep + rleft
00076         z   = (/ (i,i=0,nh-1) /) * zStep + zmid - zdim / 2.0
00077 
00078         fluxGrid    = (/ (i,i=0,nW-1) /) * fStep + simag
00079 
00080         allocate ( bR ( nw, nh ), bz ( nw, nh ), &
00081             bPhi ( nw, nh ), bMag(nw,nh) )
00082 
00083         bR  = dlg_pDeriv ( psizr, 2, zStep ) * 1.0
00084         bz  = -1.0 * dlg_pDeriv ( psizr, 1, rStep ) * 1.0
00085 
00086         !   Remember psi = - R * A
00087 
00088         do i=1,nw
00089             do j=1,nh
00090                 bR(i,j)  = -bR(i,j) / r(i)
00091                 bz(i,j)  = -bz(i,j) / r(i)
00092             enddo
00093         enddo
00094        
00095         allocate ( xp(nw), yp(nw), temp(nw), ss(nw), fpolRZ(nw,nh), yp_c(nw) ) 
00096 
00097         !   curv1 initialises the spline (fitpack.f)
00098 
00099 !        call kurv1 ( nw, fluxGrid, fpol, spl1, spln, 3, xp, yp, temp, ss, 0.0, iErr )
00100         call curv1 ( nw, fluxGrid, fpol, spl1, spln, 3, yp_c, temp, sigma, iErr )
00101  
00102         do i=1,nw
00103             do j=1,nh
00104 
00105                 !   curv2 evaluates the spline (fitpack.f)
00106                
00107                 t   =  ( psizr(i,j) - simag ) / ( sibry - simag )
00108                 !call kurv2 ( t, xs, ys, nw, fluxGrid, fpol, xp, yp, ss, 0.0 )
00109                 !fPolRZ(i,j) = ys
00110                 fPolRZ(i,j) = curv2 ( psizr(i,j), nw, fluxGrid, fpol, &
00111                     yp_c, sigma )
00112                 bPhi(i,j)   = fpolRZ(i,j) / r(i)
00113 
00114             end do
00115         end do
00116       
00117 !        !   Test the fitpack interpolation
00118 !
00119 !        do i=1,nw
00120 !            
00121 !            t   =  ( fluxGrid(i) - simag ) / ( sibry - simag )
00122 !!            call kurv2 ( t, xs, ys, nw, fluxGrid, fpol, xp, yp, ss, 0.0 )
00123 !            write (*,*) i, t, fluxGrid(i), fpol(i), xs, ys, &
00124 !                curv2 ( fluxGrid(i), nw, fluxGrid, fpol, yp_c, 0.0 )
00125 !         
00126 !        end do
00127 
00128         bMag    = sqrt ( bR**2 + bPhi**2 + bz**2 )
00129 
00130         !!   Plotting
00131 
00132         !if ( present ( plot ) ) then
00133         !    if ( plot ) then 
00134         !        
00135         !        call setFil ( 'eqdsk.eps' ) 
00136         !        call setPag ( 'DA4P' )
00137         !        call metaFl ( 'EPS' )
00138         !        call disIni ()
00139         !        call graf ( 0.0, 3.0, 0.0, 0.5, -2.0, 2.0, -2.0, 0.5 ) 
00140         !        nLevs   = 101 
00141         !        levStep    = ( maxVal ( psizr ) - minVal ( psizr ) ) / nLevs
00142         !        do i=0,nLevs-1
00143         !            lev    = i * levStep - nLevs/2*levStep
00144         !            call contur ( r, nw, z, nh, psizr, lev ) 
00145         !        end do
00146         !        call endGrf ()  
00147         !        call disFin ()
00148 
00149         !    end if 
00150         !end if
00151 
00152     end subroutine read_geqdsk
00153 
00154 end module eqdsk
